item.title: USB-C Is Now the Law of the Land in Europe
item.description: Apple has already pulled devices to comply with the European Commission’s new Common Charger Directive.

item.title: Elon Musk Is Posting Nonstop Falsehoods About 'Grooming Gangs'
item.description: Musk’s posts, which have racked up hundreds of millions of views on X, are his latest effort at inserting himself into UK politics.

item.title: Californians Say X Blocked Them From Viewing Amber Alert About Missing 14-Year-Old
item.description: Many people reported they hit a screen preventing them from seeing the alert unless they signed in.
